classMapping.nameQuery: SELECT DB_NAME() AS [object_name] , S.[name] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.schemas AS S ;
SELECT SCHEMA_NAME([schema_id]) AS [object_name] , T.[name] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.tables AS T ;
SELECT S.[name] AS [object_name] , V.[name] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.views AS V INNER JOIN {db}.sys.schemas AS S ON V.[schema_id] = S.[schema_id] ;
SELECT SCHEMA_NAME([schema_id]) AS [object_name] , P.[name] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.procedures AS P ;
SELECT SCHEMA_NAME([schema_id]) AS [object_name] , F.[name] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.objects AS F WHERE F.[type] IN (N'FN', N'FT', N'IF') ;
SELECT T.[name] AS [object_name] , C.[name] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.tables AS T INNER JOIN {db}.sys.columns AS C ON T.[object_id] = C.[object_id] ;
SELECT V.[name] AS [object_name] , C.[name] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.views AS V INNER JOIN {db}.sys.columns AS C ON V.[object_id] = C.[object_id] ;
SELECT P.[name] AS [object_name] , M.[name] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.procedures AS P INNER JOIN {db}.sys.parameters AS M ON P.[object_id] = M.[object_id]
SELECT F.[name] AS [object_name] , M.[name] AS [subobject_name] FROM {db}.sys.objects AS F INNER JOIN {db}.sys.parameters AS M ON F.[object_id] = M.[object_id] WHERE F.[type] IN (N'FN', N'FT', N'IF')
